name: Add new Voxloud phone call details in a Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new call is going through Voxloud, Make will automatically add that call details to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1AB1cGKvHMS6hSELcc69Gq2FkcVG7qqexHL3ryKMUtMs/edit?usp=sharing).
